Hi! I'm Patrícia,

a Front-End Developer from Lisbon, Portugal

Hire Me

About

My name is Patrícia Feio and I just finished my one year Web Design course in Lisbon School of Design. I'm curious, passionate and I have a true desire to learn. I'm currently looking for a job opportunity where I can develop my skills and learn from others.

When I decided to make a career change, I wanted something challenging and creative in the tech field. During my Web Design course I discovered the magic world of web development, in particular front-end development. It's a hard working creative tech field where a bunch of people challenge themselves everyday to create and develop websites that are going to be used by others.

Skills

HTML5 CSS3 Javascript
